title: 求好一点的光影
author: seastone
txt_content: 请问有好光影吗？版本：1.12.2 显卡：Intel Core i5 8th Gen 高清修复：Optifine HD_U_F5

replies.author: StreamReader
replies.txt_content: Chocapic13_V7，还有你这个显卡是UHD630或者UHD620 怎么发了个CPU出来

replies.author: -xiao_kai-
replies.txt_content:
SHZLP 发表于 2020-3-26 09:23

应该是核心显卡
